page.shortlink: api inet namespace socket class connect method
page.description: The INET::Socket::Connect() method opens a connection to the requested host and port. Note: ConnectTimeout is in milliseconds.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Connect(Host as C, Port as N [, ConnectTimeout = -1 as N])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: ConnectTimeout = -1
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (No timeout). The timeout interval in milliseconds.
